name: Jujutsu Kaisen
description:
GDD - JUJUTSU KAISEN Movements: 
  • W/A/S/D = Move
  • R = Punch
  • T = Transformation (only avaliable if you pick Yuji as your character to play with)
  • R = Shoot orb (only available if you pick Gojo as your character to play with)
OVERALL IDEA
  • Theme: Anime + Solving Real Life Problem 
  • Type of game: Platformer
  • Anime inspiration: Jujutsu Kaisen + Jujutsu Sorcery
  • Problem: Population decreases from viruses, diseases and other causes. 
  • Message: Try and help people that are on the verge of dying to stop the problem of population reduction that is happening across the world. 
  • Solution: Jujutsu sorcery can be taught from the masters so that people can prevent themselves from dying by using their power which therefore can decrease the death rates across the world.
